titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Sam Koide papers, Rockefeller University Faculty FA1049

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2015-08-10 14:36:31 -0400.

did.unittitle: Sam Koide papers, Rockefeller University Faculty

processinfo.head: Processing Information note
processinfo.p: Level 1 Minimal Processing has been conducted to establish basic intellectual and physical control of the material and assess immediate preservation and conservation needs. Material remains as received, in original folders and storage boxes.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation note
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access note
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for scholarly research.

Due to the oversize nature and potentially brittle condition of this material, special arrangements may be required in order to view it. Individual item may be restricted due to preservation concerns.

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements note
phystech.p: Materials requiring specialized equipment for access (film, audio, video, slides) may be restricted from scholarly research dependent on availability of the applicable equipment.
Brittle or damaged items, or materials otherwise in need of preservation care, may be restricted from scholarly research at the discretion of the RAC Head of Archival Services/RAC Head of Reference.

did.unittitle: Ceramic reproduction of Noguchi group portrait.

accessrestrict.p: Due to the oversize nature and potentially brittle condition of this material, special arrangements may be required in order to view it. Individual item may be restricted due to preservation concerns.
